project.description:
Upload the result of package-osx to download.rethinkdb.com
The ssh url was ssh://dotcloud@download-I7KSYN2O.azva.dotcloud.net:21185

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
test "`sw_vers -productVersion`" == 10.7.5 || ( echo OS X builds need to be built on OS X 10.7.5 false )
# check if dotcloud is configured correctly dotcloud check
# generate the dotcloud config file for download.rethinkdb.com cat > dotcloud.yml << EOF www: type: static EOF
dotcloud connect download
# extract the ssh connection information for connecting to the dotcloud instance SSH_LINE="`dotcloud info www | grep 'ssh:'`" USERHOSTPORT="${SSH_LINE#*ssh://}" USERHOST=${USERHOSTPORT%:*} PORT=${USERHOSTPORT#*:}
# copy the file scp -P "$PORT" -o "IdentityFile $HOME/.dotcloud_cli/dotcloud.key" rethinkdb-*.dmg "$USERHOST:static/osx/nightly/"
